chirp.name: Johnny E.
chirp.message: We are about to enter the woods.

chirp.name: Crazy K
chirp.message: You were just in the wrong place at the wrong time.

chirp.name: Protester
chirp.message: There is no peace in the dollhouse.

chirp.name: Mr. Punch
chirp.message: You will know Ralph, you will know.
